channel.title: 19 December BM game night
channel.description:
This Saturday we will have another game night after the quite successful [url=https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=2531]first one[/url].
Time will be the same (8 PM GMT).
I took the most suggested mods/games of the previous thread for this poll. The mod/game with the most votes obviously becomes the mod/game we will use for the next event.
Also, the password will be the same(gordanf).
Edit: Oh yeah also, the game or mod that comes out second will probably be used for the event after this.
Edit2: As you can see, the next event will be CSS, and the one after that Synergy.

item.title: 19 December BM game night
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Is the server active then? It won’t add the server to favourites.

EDIT: Ok nevermind, its working.

EDIT2: Oh damn, it won’t let me join because I have a modded version of Counter Strike.

Oh well.

λdam:

I can’t do this now as I’ve lost all my files on my HDD. :’(

Daaamn… I wanted to do it…
Well, when I get my new HD, hopefully we’ll be doing another one of these.

Please get your shit working next time… we only got about 6 people at once.

Still was fun.

Can’t wait till next week to play some Synergy!

Read full topic

item.title: 19 December BM game night

item.description:
That was a bit of a flop. Only 8 out of the 48 that voted showed up, far less than the TF2 game(server space was cramped).

Also some random people showed up… which was disturbing.

EDIT:
STALIN CAT IS NOT AMUSED.

item.title: 19 December BM game night
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Can we have an IP address? It will be required, given the huge amount of servers that CS: S uses, and therefore the difficulty in finding the right server.

server.theicecave.net:27042

is the IP address, you can type it in the “favourites” window and it will work.

item.title: 19 December BM game night
item.dc:creator: Doom
item.description:
Master Chef:

I never knew that the Netherlands stretched all the way down to Australia.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zeeland

Also, we discovered New Zealand! That’s why it’s spelt with a Z!

saivert:

why does everybody posting here or who wants to be in on this event have to play on a server at the same time. That is just not going to work.

Arrange it like a tournament instead with several rounds. Break it up in teams and the winners each round continue to fight each other until a finale.
This would work with L4D(2) Versus or salvage mode too.

You guys should be ashamed of yourself if you can’t pull that off with minimal fuss. Just decide on the teams in this thread and then appoint a person to keep scores.

Not really what this game night thing is for, if people want it, they’d have to do it on their own.

Read full topic

saivert:

why does everybody posting here or who wants to be in on this event have to play on a server at the same time. That is just not going to work.

Arrange it like a tournament instead with several rounds. Break it up in teams and the winners each round continue to fight each other until a finale.
This would work with L4D(2) Versus or salvage mode too.

You guys should be ashamed of yourself if you can’t pull that off with minimal fuss. Just decide on the teams in this thread and then appoint a person to keep scores.

I want this. So very very much.

INB4 one of the teams is “Team Walrus”
